Items.Title: HiveView
Items.Desc: A control that presents a collection of items, simple positions child elements as a hive with fixed edge.

Items.Title: HiveWrapView
Items.Desc: A control that base on HiveView, positions child elements in sequential position from left to right, breaking content to next line at the edge of containing box. Also with fixed edge.

Items.Title: HiveGridView
Items.Desc: A control that base on HiveView, presents a collection of items in hive rows and columns.

Items.Title: AutoFillPanel
Items.Desc: A panel that auto arranging child elements in available area.

Items.Title: AutoFillLayout
Items.Desc: A layout inherited from VirtualizingLayout that auto arranging child elements in available area.

Items.Title: HiveGrid
Items.Desc: A panel that arranging child elements in hive rows and columns, with fixed edge or auto size when set FixedEdge to zero.

Title: Symbols
Desc: The symbols of `Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Symbol`. **Click item to copy name**. Sample use a `HiveView` as `SemanticZoom.ZoomedOutView`.
